featured.text: The jewel of the architecture is the 22-domed Transfiguration Church, built in the early 1700s.
It typically comes in a very wide variety, from fairly plain to quite elaborate silver- and jewel-ornamented designs.

definition.zh_def: 珠寶，通常指貴重的石頭或金屬，常用於裝飾或作為收藏品。
definition.en_def: A precious stone or a piece of jewelry, often used for decoration or as a collectible.
definition.example: She wore a beautiful jewel around her neck.
